COMEDY NIGHT AT THE BLOCK
.entry-header
Come support Live Comedy at The Block!
It’s The Comedy Zone at The Block on Eglin Parkway every Saturday with nationally touring comedians. Many comedians from The Comedy Zone have been on Comedy Central, HBO and other TV shows. They travel far and wide and bring their best material to Fort Walton Beach. Doors open at 6pm, seating at 7pm and comedy starts around 8:15pm with 2 comedians each week.
“Like” the Comedy Zone
and Don’t miss this AWESOME SHOW!
Comedians are subject to change.
.entry-content
Category:
SPECIAL EVENTS
#post-##
Posted on
by

.entry-header
Wednesday
Karaoke opens at 6 pm
Other areas open at 7 pm
Line Dance Lessons (start at 7:30)
Thursda
y
Karaoke opens at 8 pm
Other areas open at 8 pm
Latin Night (Dance Lessons start at 8:30)
Friday
Karaoke opens at 6 pm
Other areas open at 8 pm
Saturday
Karaoke opens at 6 pm
Other areas open at 7 pm (Comedy Night)
Closed Sunday through Tuesday
On SPECIAL EVENTS held at The Block, Karaoke Club opens at 6 pm
, and all other Clubs open at 7 pm
.
.entry-content

.entry-header
WARNING
Do not purchase or attempt to purchase tickets for this venue from any 3rd Party vendors. We do not allow any outside agency to sell tickets for any event at The Block. Beware of any site that claims to be a resale marketplace or specifies that they are not associated with the artist. Only tickets purchased through The Block will be honored.
.entry-content

SPORTS / KARAOKE BLOCK

SPECIAL EVENT / CONCERT INFORMATION
.entry-header
Online purchases are for customers age 21 and older only.
All “tickets” are non-transferable and non-refundable.
A confirmation email/credit card receipt will be sent after online purchase is approved which will include an ORDER NUMBER and/or INVOICE NUMBER (TB-XXXX).
Print email, including order number/invoice number or show on mobile device for verification of purchase upon entry.
“Tickets” will ONLY be presented at the door on the night of the show.
Please note, “tickets” will ONLY be presented to original purchaser from the online purchase.
You must show your confirmation email/credit card receipt and legal ID at the door.
“Tickets” can be purchased on this secure web site up until the day of the show.
If additional “tickets” are still available on the day of show, they will be sold at the door when the doors open.
Doors open at 6:00pm, artists to hit stage approximately 8:30-9:00 pm.
Show time may be affected by a Friday/Saturday night show or dual artist playing the same night.
No drink specials are offered on Special Event nights.
WARNING
Do not purchase or attempt to purchase tickets for this venue from any 3rd Party vendors. We do not allow any outside agency to sell tickets for any event at The Block. Beware of any site that claims to be a resale marketplace or specifies that they are not associated with the artist. Only tickets purchased through The Block will be honored.
NOTICE
We are conducting individual temperature scans on entry. We appreciate your cooperation and patience.
.entry-content
#post-##
